tool_description: Identifies sentence boundaries in text using linguistic rules and machine learning models to establish fundamental segmentation units.

input_text.description: Preprocessed text for sentence boundary detection

language.description: Language code for language-specific rules (en, es, fr, de, etc.)

detection_method.description: Detection approach: rule_based, ml_model, or hybrid

min_sentence_length.description: Minimum characters required for valid sentence

error_messages: Unsupported language: Language code not supported by the detection models.
Invalid detection method: Use rule_based, ml_model, or hybrid.
Text too short: Input text must contain at least one complete sentence.
Invalid min_sentence_length: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 1000.
usage: Provide input_text and configure detection parameters. Returns sentence boundaries and individual sentences.

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each detected boundary
